$ dart run bin/dartdoc_test.dart -h
A tool to extract and analyze code samples in Dart projects.

Usage: dartdoc_test <command> [arguments]

Global options:
-h, --help            Print this usage information.
-v, --[no-]verbose    Print verbose output

Available commands:
  add       Add dartdoc_test test file "test/dartdoc_test.dart"
  analyze   Analyze code samples in the current directory.

Run "dartdoc_test help <command>" for more information about a command.
